amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 937 of the bill relating to Modification of Temporary Suspension of Public-Private Competitions for Conversion of Department of Defense Functions to Contractor Performance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 112-88 to strike Section 937 of the bill relating to Modification of Temporary Suspension of Public-Private Competitions for Conversion of Department of Defense Functions to Contractor Performance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sarbanes amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 345).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sarbanes amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 345).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Sarbanes.
